title: Textile, 1830s or 40s
medium:
Medium: cotton
Techinque: printed by engraved roller on plain weave
dimensions:
Warp x Weft (a): 198 x 71 cm (6 ft. 5 15/16 in. x 27 15/16 in.)
Warp x Weft (b): 198 x 71 cm (6 ft. 5 15/16 in. x 27 15/16 in.)
Warp x Weft (c): 198 x 71 cm (6 ft. 5 15/16 in. x 27 15/16 in.)
description: Half dropped repeat of two vertical twisting and curving ribbons with flowers attached in purple on a tan background. Minimum unit of repeat: 42cm (16 1/2") x 34.5cm (13 5/8") wide. 2 units wide. Fabric lengths placed side by side would have continued pattern. Structure/Technique: Plain weave. Roller printed.
